name: Create Payment Instrument
descriptionHtml:
Request:

POST - http://44.228.71.230/v1/payment_instruments/create

raw 
  {
  "type": "CARD",
  "association_name": "Visa",
  "holder_name": "Sue Barrows",
  "number": "4264281511112228",
  "expiration": {
    "month": "09",
    "year": "2025"
  },
  "security_code": "123",
  "billing": {
    "address": {
      "country_code": "US",
      "country_subdivision_code": "US-NY",
      "city": "New York",
      "postal_code": "33102",
      "line1": "382 NE 191st St"
    }
  }
}

Response:

200 - OK 

  {"data":{"id":"017940c2-bfe0-b1ce-cad1-a9ab4fee851e","type":"CARD","holder_name":"Sue Barrows","number_last4":"2228","expiration":{"year":"2025","month":"09"},"billing":{"address":{"country_code":"US","country_subdivision_code":"US-NY","city":"New York","postal_code":"33102","line1":"382 NE 191st St","line2":null}},"association_name":"Visa"}}
